entry.title: $2575 // NO FEE! 700 SF 1BR w/HOME OFFICE
entry.content:
NO FEE! 700 SF 1BR w/HOME OFFICE

Listing ID #: 1037701
Price: $2,575
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.5
Bathrooms: 1.0

Apartment Amenities

Dishwasher
Hardwood
NO FEE

NO FEE! Huge 1 bedroom with home office. 700 square feet! Hardwood strip flooring. Stainless steel appliances. Dishwasher. Railroad style unit with foyer room connecting the dining area and living room. Bedroom has open east facing exposure. Marble bathroom. Access to laundry room and gym in building next door!
